name: 財務管理
description:
1.	Sharing my own business experiences, and utilizing financial statements of the listed companies, case studies, international journal papers, simulation games, and projects exercises to motivate students to comprehend and have the capability to aid the entrepreneur making the right financial decision.
2.	Using the assignments, mid-term project, and term project to develop students’ abilities with figure-oriented analysis and decision-making from the financial perspective.
goals: 1.	Comprehend and analyze the financial statements for Taiwan listed electronic and hi-tech companies.
2.	Utilize the financial ratio methods to identify and improve the problems.
3.	Benchmark the international cases using the international journal papers and business cases.
1.	Use the mid-term project to make students to present the financial analysis and decision-making processes for one of the Taiwan listed companies.
2.	Use the term project to motivate students to apply the financial theories and knowledge to complete the comprehensive finance decision.
1.	Utilize the case study, papers, midterm project and term project to develop students’ presentation capability.
2.	Through case study and international journal papers to learn the state-of-art financial studies.
1.	Use my own business experiences to share the ethical issues and introduce the reporting system in the financial institutions
2.	Select the business cases from licensed Harvard business review and the commercial development & research institute.
syllabus:
1.  Contemporary Financial Management
2.  The Tax Environment
3.  Introduction to Financial Statements
4.  Accounting—A Financial Information System
5.  Special Topics in Accounting
6.  Financial Statement Analysis
7.  Financial Forecasting and Cash Budgeting
8.  Breakeven Analysis for Profit Planning
9.  Working Capital Policy
10.  Working Capital Management
11.  Mathematics of Compound Interest
12.  Capital Budgeting
13.  Cost of Capital
14.  Valuation of Financial Assets
15.  Valuing Closely Held Businesses
16.  Sources and Forms of Long-Term Financing
17.  Corporate Governance
18.  International Finance
19.  Mergers and Acquisitions
20.  Regulation and Risk Management
21.  Final project

methodologies.note: 講解財務管理基本知識
期末專題，解決實務問題

grading.note: 請準時出席，無法出席請事先請假，缺席一次扣總分五分
期末專題需口頭報告並繳交紙本分析
